column4: is it possible to have 2 OS's working in one session, and flip ebtween the 2?
Like Linux and windows or is that never ever gonna happen
using vmware you can achieve that right now

however if you have xp installed already then i would suggest that you run linux in vmware server/player inside windows until such time as you want to dispense with windows ... why?  its hugely more timeconsuming to reinstall windows than ubuntu
